title: EMDR Refresher Training - Desensitisation Phase
description: In this mini-course Naomi talks about the desensitisation phase, which is a phase four of the EMDR protocol. Desensitisation is what lots of people think about when they hear the term EMDR. It's the stage where we have bilateral stimulation and where we are getting our clients to think about the distressing thought and to pair that with bilateral stimulation. This course has two role plays.
